enabled.description: The Https Redirection state of the load balancer. `true` to activate http to https redirection or `false` to deactivate http to https redirection.

lbName.description: The name of the load balancer to which you want to enable http to https redirection.

enabled.description: The Https Redirection state of the load balancer. `true` to activate http to https redirection or `false` to deactivate http to https redirection.

lbName.description: The name of the load balancer to which you want to enable http to https redirection.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering LbHttpsRedirectionPolicy resources.

enabled.description: The Https Redirection state of the load balancer. `true` to activate http to https redirection or `false` to deactivate http to https redirection.
